trans-unit.source: Provides control capability to validate that another control's value matches a provided regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制項功能，以驗證另一個控制項的值是否符合提供的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: This class behaves identically to the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的行為即會相同 asp.net<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>表單上的控制項引發時要執行驗證表單提交給伺服器表單上的驗證程式控制項。

trans-unit.source: To disable automatic validation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用自動驗證，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>至`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how you can add regular expression properties, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator.ValidationExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> properties, programmatically during a page load.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何在加入規則運算式的屬性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator.ValidationExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>屬性，以程式設計方式在頁面載入過程中。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: Virtual method for derived class to create its own aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立本身彙總 Web 驗證程式之衍生類別的虛擬方法。

trans-unit.source: The Web validator is for getting and setting of the common properties of Web base validator.
trans-unit.target: Web 驗證程式可用於取得及設定 Web 基底驗證程式的通用屬性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: An aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 彙總的 Web 驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: Called during the validation stage when ASP.NET processes a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 處理網頁時於驗證階段呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the validator is valid, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證程式有效則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定做為驗證準則的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 指定做為驗證準則的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> does not perform validation on an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> 不會對空字串執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: To test for an empty string, use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> controls together.
trans-unit.target: 如果要測試空字串，請同時使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some sample validation expressions:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示一些範例驗證運算式：

trans-unit.source: Type of Validation
trans-unit.target: 驗證的類型

trans-unit.source: Validation Expression
trans-unit.target: 驗證運算式

trans-unit.source: Email
trans-unit.target: Email

trans-unit.source: Phone number
trans-unit.target: 電話號碼

trans-unit.source: URL
trans-unit.target: URL

trans-unit.source: The regular expression assigned was malformed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的規則運算式錯誤。
